name: Chromix
description:
Chromix2D is a 2D platformer game where you'll have to cooperate to escape a bi-chromic world. Players will be able to paint some blocks and when they'll sit on their, it will change players's attributes; for example blue painting allows you to jump far higher.

Explore, coopérate, but mostly dont do MIXtakes because painting a block is irreversible.
